bibdata.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Standard for the Functional Verification Language 'E' (Replaced by the Approved IEEE Draft)
Unapproved IEEE Draft Standard for the Functional Verification Language 'E' (Replaced by the Approved IEEE Draft)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The scope of this standard is the definition of the e functional verification language. This standard aims to serve as an authoritative source for the definition of (a) syntax and semantics of e language constructs (b) the e language interaction with standard simulation languages (c) e language libraries This revision extends the standard to cover novel verification-related features.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
